mapper.select:
SELECT base.in_out AS in_out /* 입수 구분 */ , base.degree AS degree /* 차수 */ , base.real_symbol AS real_symbol /* 실시간 심볼 */ , base.incre_symbol AS incre_symbol /* 증가 심볼 */ , base.rest_date AS rest_date /* 휴장일 */ , base.recently_date AS recently_date /* 최근일자 */ , base.incre_recently AS incre_recently /* 최근증가 */ , base.base_date AS base_date /* 기준일자 */
FROM ( SELECT 'OK' AS in_out /* 입수 구분 */ , 'S&P GCCI1' AS degree /* 차수 */ , 'S&P GCCI1' AS real_symbol /* 실시간 심볼 */ , 'S&P GCCI1' AS incre_symbol /* 증가 심볼 */ , '2018.04.01' AS rest_date /* 휴장일 */ , '2018.04.01' AS recently_date /* 최근일자 */ , 11111111 AS incre_recently /* 최근증가 */ , '2018.04.01' AS base_date /* 기준일자 */
FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT 'NO' AS in_out /* 입수 구분 */ , 'S&P GCCI2' AS degree /* 차수 */ , 'S&P GCCI2' AS real_symbol /* 실시간 심볼 */ , 'S&P GCCI2' AS incre_symbol /* 증가 심볼 */ , '2018.04.02' AS rest_date /* 휴장일 */ , '2018.04.02' AS recently_date /* 최근일자 */ , 22222222 AS incre_recently /* 최근증가 */ , '2018.04.02' AS base_date /* 기준일자 */
FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT 'OK' AS in_out /* 입수 구분 */ , 'S&P GCCI3' AS degree /* 차수 */ , 'S&P GCCI3' AS real_symbol /* 실시간 심볼 */ , 'S&P GCCI3' AS incre_symbol /* 증가 심볼 */ , '2018.04.03' AS rest_date /* 휴장일 */ , '2018.04.03' AS recently_date /* 최근일자 */ , 3333333 AS incre_recently /* 최근증가 */ , '2018.04.03' AS base_date /* 기준일자 */
FROM dual
) base
WHERE 1 = 1
